website_summaries.verdict: This smaller, beach-themed kinetic sand set is the perfect size for smaller children and makes a great birthday gift.
pros: Comes with sand castle molds, beach-themed shapes,and sand castle tray
cons: Does not include as much sand as pictured on box

customer_reviews.title: Complete disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed in this purchase. $28 dollars and from the picture it looks like you will get a box full of sand. Truth is it comes and the sand covers MAYBE 1/4 of the box. Would've been much better off to buy a bag of sand and separate molds. Complete rip off would definitely recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SENSORY ACTIVITY
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Clean. Soft. Sticks to itself. Does not make any mess. Does not stick to our hands. Easy to clean. No odors. No perfumes. Does not bother our allergies. Perfect amount for sensory activity for my Autistic SPD toddler. Absolutely fantastic. Would recommend and would buy more. Brings sand. 3 molds. 1 scooper rake. One tray. We bought a little bag of sea creatures to add for fun! See photo. :-)
customer_reviews.author: ZaVi25HonestMommy

customer_reviews.title: Super addicting to play with
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kid but I have been playing with it all day as well. It's addicting. Pros: 1) Doesn't dry out, so I don't have to worry about sealing it in a container when we're done playing with it. 2) Doesn't leave any kind of sticky residue on hands like I thought it would. Leaves your hands clean. 3) Lots of fun. Holds it's shape when you want it to and turns soft when you let it fall slowly out of your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Worley

customer_reviews.title: Rainy Day Rescue!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I little ones loves this sand, he is only 2 but this occupies him for hours on a rainy day when we have to stay inside and play. He does tend to make a lot of mess with it, but it cleans up so easily. It basically sticks to itself and picks up nicely so that he can continue to play with it. Also, it does not dry out when left out in the open for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not a lot of sand
customer_reviews.text: Man, this was not a lot of sand... not at all. That said, the tray is sturdy, the few molds that come with it are fun and my 3 yo spends 30 min to 1 h playing with it (under my supervision). Now that might not sound like much, but he has ASD and is hyperactive, so doesn't spend more than 5 min at any particular task. So... I went ahead and purchased more sand, more molds and tools and a bigger box, with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Love kinetic sand for my child especially as a sensory product, this product was a good price came with the sand, a pretty good size plastic snadbox I guess you would call it lol also came with items to use in the sand! As for mess, it's easy to remove from a rug vacuuming then dealing with slime🤣
customer_reviews.author: Subiesweetheart

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Sand, a play tray, and molds. What more could you ask for? I combined this with another tray holder with molds to add more to an all around Kinetic Sand experience for my 3 year old grandson for Christmas. Both he and my 5 year old granddaughter used the two sets a lot while I was there. Seemed to be their "go-to" toy, for kids who have far too many toys already. I think it's because there is more imagination involved with Kinetic Sand --- like a day at the beach, inside your house.
customer_reviews.author: DEHM

customer_reviews.title: Not very much sand included
customer_reviews.text: Fun sensory item for my toddler. The box is small and plastic probably not big enough for sharing. The tools and molds that come with it are great and fun. The picture on the box on the amount of sand that you get is very deceiving. Not even half of what is shown on the box, but it still keeps my toddler entertained. You'd get a better deal just buying a tupperwear container with a bigger bag of sand.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie gee

customer_reviews.title: Not generic colors for boys or girls.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this for my grandson son. I read a lot of reviews and 99% said it was blue sand.. hence the blue castle on the box. Then it comes in purple and damaged. No Easter present
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: This is not blue sand
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it was blue sand for my son since I bought my daughter the purple set, but I received another purple one that my son is going to refuse to play with because it’s a “girl color.” You should be able to specify the color sand you want and it should be clearly stated that item is not as pictured (blue)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only thing is the clean up would be easier if you have a table or they play some where where there are no grooves. Everytime daughter was done playing we would have to pull out the vac and clean what was in the groves. But great product and kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Maximo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!! I know it says 3 years old and up, but my 1.5 year old son loves it. It is mess free, easy to pick up and had just the right amount of sand for him to play. I even bought a bag of green kinetic sand to switch out colors once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Great for those Zen moments. Just push the kids aside for ME time with this stuff. It is so relaxing and fun to play with! I just wish there were mini sets for the office, lol. If you have never played with Kinetic Sand, you are missing out. I cannot tell you how relaxing this stuff can be... Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Pairadize

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Fun my girls have fun playing with the sand. I bought extra colors of sand for them to have more sand because the sand in the box is ok but the kids would like to have more. I also bought a set of tools to make more figures with the sand. Happy girls. I will recommend.Kinetic Sand Neon Colors | Gift Set of 4 Colors - Purple, Blue, Pink & Green 5 oz Containers
customer_reviews.author: FRANCY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I got this as a gift for our niece and she absolutely loves it! The price is very reasonable and this keeps our niece happily occupied. I can definitely see us purchasing this kinetic sand again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The 1 lb bag that comes with the kit is just enough and the beach and castle molds are a lot of fun. I love that the tray does a good ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this kit. The kinetic sand is addicting to play with. The 1 lb bag that comes with the kit is just enough and the beach and castle molds are a lot of fun. I love that the tray does a good job of containing the sand.
customer_reviews.author: kbf

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves kinetic sand
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old for christmas. I love that it comes with a box that seems like it’s made to use with it. She loves playing with the molds and using the little rake/shovel. Great set.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware...any color disclaimer...very small print!
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the box is misleading. Did not notice the disclaimer that you could receive any color....I was expecting blue and got green. But the print was very very small......
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I comes with sand tray and toys to play in the sand with( no lid or way to store sand other in the open tray)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended with Full Supervision. Easy Cleanup
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful. Fascinating for kids and adults as this "sand" slowly flows through your fingers. Easy to clean up even if it gets in carpet. A vacuum makes an easy job of it. Requires full supervision as I wouldn't want any of this near the eyes, nose, or mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Demosthenes

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had been wanting kinetic sand for so long, so I sent her this as a surprise. Not only did she love getting a package in the mail, but as soon as she opened it, she jumped for joy! Easy cleanup, and never dries out. We store our in a ziplock. Even fun for the adults to play with, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is cool my almost 4 yr old granddaughter loves it! I do too! She was so excited to get this set, a little sandbox it's so fun! I would recommend getting another 1 lb bag of sand to really fill the sandbox though. But this set is a great starter, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: R. Amato

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to dry!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves it! Our package has the green colored sand, it really is great, this product brings out the imagination and creativity a parent wants to see from their children!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Children will love
customer_reviews.text: Something my child loves always and it’s very easy for me to play with her with. Nice and easy to clean up and good price and even feels like a therapeutic thing lol
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Bugs in sand
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sand for my 5 year old, while we were playing with it we found a bunch of little insects in the sand. Please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Renata K.

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for kids and adults alike.
customer_reviews.text: Got some of this for my three year old granddaughter for her birthday, and her then 10 year old brother requested some for his birthday. At both birthday parties, the adults had just as much fun with it as the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for the price! My toddler loves being able to fill shapes & use them for pushing designs into sand. The box you play with it in makes it easy to help maintain any messes & sand getting everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna J Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: Squish Slice Smash
customer_reviews.text: Hours of addicting, hand-cramping fun. Got the bright green color. No mess, about a cup and a half to two cups worth. I feel like the toy molds included are a joke, but I am sure my daughter will like to use those as she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin m

customer_reviews.title: Children love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure exactly what this is. It looks exactly like sand, but is really does stick together. Great fun for the children to play indoors in the winter without a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wazowski

customer_reviews.title: It's just sand but it's addicting to play with.
customer_reviews.text: Geez, in a family of 3 adults, we practically fight over who gets to use this. It is quite relaxing to play with. I didn't pay attention when ordering and didn't realize that the color you get will vary so just be aware of that if it matters to you, it didn't to me.
customer_reviews.author: P. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Stuff EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this for my calming center in my classroom. When it arrived my children naturally wanted to open it right away, so we did. My kids loved it, I LOVED it. I can't stop running my fingers through it. This is the coolest stuff on earth. I'm buying another set so that I can have one at home and one at school.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sand for my 5 year old grandson who loves this stuff! Lots of hours playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Newton

customer_reviews.title: Super Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and I find myself playing with it just as much as her! Amazing stuff. You have to experience it to understand. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: BTR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sand
customer_reviews.text: If your little one loves Kinetic sand this is the one to get. Easy to easy up and the sand is nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Cool stuff and great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 yr old nephew for Christmas and I'm not sure if the adults left it alone ling enough for him to play with it. Cool stuff and great, prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it (adults too) this stuff is pretty cool. It's like awesome sand that sticks together. Have not had any issues with color transfter..... kids use it at the kitchen table though
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Bethanie

customer_reviews.title: We love kinetic sand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old niece. We love kinetic sand, and these little sets are fun. The best part about this set is the plastic base.
customer_reviews.author: tia_nuruTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a busy 4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: We have literally not put this toy away for months. Our son plays with this every day. It never dries out. I love this stuff. It's really fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a 3 year old but we all enjoyed playing with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 3 year old but we all enjoyed playing with it. Take note the picture show 2 pounds of sand but there is only one pound of sand included. Ordered more sand so there was enough to share. Very relaxing and soothing.
customer_reviews.author: gram

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids needs more sand than comes with so I just bought an extra bag to go with love the tray great to start you sand toy collection with
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My kids will save their money to buy more kinetic sand. Worth the money. Won't dry out if left out. Don't get it too wet or it will have a hard time drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun fun! I put this in a tub and it keeps children entertained for a while. That’s all we really care about right?? Could make a mess....
customer_reviews.author: Kristina W.

customer_reviews.title: got these for gifts!
customer_reviews.text: lucked out by getting these at half their price. wanted to buy a few more just to get more sand and the price had doubled! good sand!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy A. Stamp

customer_reviews.title: Needs to come with more sand
customer_reviews.text: If you have a busy toddler, this stuff will get all over the place. Everytime we get it out, we lose a little more sand. It doesnt come with nearly enough. They need to include at least two bags.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie, NY

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, make sure to store it in an air tight container and keep it away from animals if you have any or hair will get in it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very squishy
customer_reviews.text: Made the kid happy so I’m happy. Fun and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: NeyGom

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Gift for the kids but I play with it also. Love it and so relaxing to play with
customer_reviews.author: HeyGuy83

customer_reviews.title: This was fun for one day only
customer_reviews.text: This was fun for one day only. The sand doesn't really stick together as great as the videos show. The kids loved it but preferred playdough.
customer_reviews.author: MamaB

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked to be able to pick the color it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was new and in original packaging. Item is as advertised. Would have liked to be able to pick the color it was the only seller that could ship the product right away.
customer_reviews.author: blissfullinsanity

customer_reviews.title: Mess Galore
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has caused the largest mess in my house!! It claims to be mess free, but not if children are using it. Sand is everywhere! I have a designated toy table for arts/crafts/playdough, but the sand has still managed to make it all over my house! In$wwcluding the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Summers

customer_reviews.title: It feels a little different than real sand but it molds perfectly like play doh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he and his mom lov this stuff!! It feels a little different than real sand but it molds perfectly like play doh. The best part is the clean up! It doesn't dry out and you can easily pick up small chunks that were dropped by using a bigger chunk of sand!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Luna

customer_reviews.title: Wait til it is on sale. Great fun though!
customer_reviews.text: My kids play with this for hours at the table. Seriously a great invention. Cleanup is easy

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my little cousins for Christmas. As soon as they opened up the package they played the entire night! This was so much fun to play with!

customer_reviews.title: over priced sand, was expecting alot more
customer_reviews.text: not a great value. get at least 2 -3 pounds of sand. play kit was nice though, had fun for 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fascinating it watch how it works.
customer_reviews.text: My two boys really liked the kinetic sand. They like how it feels and how it drips out of their hands. It is sort of fascinating to watch. They also liked how it held It’s shape well.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Dugan-phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining on wet days
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 3 and loves this. It's great for winter when we can't get out as much. Easy to clean up and store. We will definitely be ordering more sand too

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So fun and satisfying to play with! Holds shape of molds perfectly! Even my older kids enjoyed it!

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product with Misleading Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The photo on the box I feel provides a very false sense of how much sand you actually get in the package. Fun product, but definitely need to purchase extra sand to get anywhere near the amount of product seen on box.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is so cool! Will still make a mess if the kiddo ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so cool! Will still make a mess if the kiddo is too young, but super easy to clean up!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son loves it. Better than playdough n easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages

product_meta.title: Kinetic Sand - Sandcastle Set with 1lb of Kinetic Sand and Tools and Molds (Color May Vary)
product_meta.description: Color:(Colors Vary)The one and only Kinetic Sand! It's the squeezable sensory sand where you can FEEL the fun. You’ve seen play sand before, but you’ve never felt anything like this! Pack it, pull it, shape it and love it. Kinetic Sand is such a cool sand you can’t put it down. It’s kinetic – meaning it sticks to itself and not to you allowing you to shape and mold create impressive pieces of art with great detail! It's unique formula makes it soft and stretchy, great to touch and play while delivering non-stop fun. It oozes, moves and melts right before your eyes, flowing through your fingers like a slow-moving liquid, but leaves them completely dry making clean up super easy. A versatile compound that's an excellent creative toy for all ages keeping your kids engaged for hours. The Kinetic Sand Sandcastle set comes with 1 pound of sand, 3 molds, a beach tool, and a sand box to play in so they can build their own sand castle at home at home and pretend they are at the beach; it can be used indoors and outdoors no matter what the weather is outside. Because Kinetic sand never dries out or hardens, it like a magic sand, so you can create anything you can imagine over and over again.It’s squeezable sand you can’t put down where the creative possibilities are endless! Feel the difference with the one and only Kinetic Sand!
feature_bullets: THE ONE AND ONLY KINETIC SAND: is like magic sand that sticks to itself and not to you! It oozes, moves and melts right before your eyes. It flows through your fingers like a slow-moving liquid, but leaves them completely dry.
NON-TOXIC: Made with a special formula of beach sand and polymers, this addictive sensory sand is hypoallergenic, and non-toxic making it a perfect gift for indoor or outdoor play for kids aged 3+.
Includes: 1lb (454g) Kinetic Sand, 3 Plastic Sand Molds, 1 Tool, 1 Plastic Sand Box Tray, 1 Instruction Guide

BRING HOME BEACH SAND FUN WITHOUT THE MESS: One touch and you can feel the fun. This cool sand feels like wet beach sand but won’t stick to anything but itself. That means no sand on your hands, clothes, molds, in your hair or in your bag. It leaves your hands completely dry and never greasy. Use the convenient tray; perfect for indoor play and easy cleanup!

ENDLESS EDUCATIONAL CREATIVE FUN: Stimulate children's imagination and enhance their manipulative ability. Use the included molds to to easily shape or sculpt beach themed shapes that impressively holds their shape with incredible detail. Since it never dries out or hardens, you can build again and again!
